donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Outputs for this project include; compliance to publicfinancial management; data collection through routine administrative systems and surveys, management and analysis under the Tanzania Statistical Master Plan (TSMP); M&E systems and tools developed and in use by sector and national M&E units; improved knowledge and skills in poverty analysis; monitoring, evaluation and communication on th implementation and progress of MKUZA II as reported through key analytical reports; participation of CSOs in the monitoring and evaluation systems.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Poverty M&E database system produces timely statisticson poverty, vulnerability and environment trends for national  and sub-national planning and budgeting. Local Government Monitoring Database (LGMD) is functional  and enhances performance reporting. National Audit Office provides high quality and timely audit services. Programme to support employment opportunities for the Youth enhanced.

This project will support the national efforts to produce THDR, which will also be used as an advocacy tool to influence policy-options/decisions and change. Among others, the project aims to strengthen existing data systems, research and analytic capacity in areas of sustainable human development.

project_descr: Capacity Development for Results Based Monitoring and Auditing
project_title: Capacity Development for Monitoring and Auditing
